programme.title: Funny Farm
programme.desc: Everything goes haywire for a city couple after they buy a country retreat in Vermont.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: An obnoxious weatherman finds himself reliving the same 24-hour period over and over.

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: A green cop unwittingly records the death of a drug dealer with her body camera. Reviewing the footage, she realizes that the death was no accident. She must align with the most unlikely person in her community to outwit the thugs on a vengeful warpath and her fellow officers looking to hide the truth.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: A former Green Beret wages a one-man war against police and the National Guard in the Pacific Northwest.

programme.title: Under the Skin
programme.desc: An alien assumes the form of an alluring female and prowls the streets of Scotland, leading lonely and unsuspecting men to their doom in this intriguing, visually arresting sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: Son of a Gun
programme.desc: An incarcerated teen befriends a notorious criminal, and together they stage a daring prison break in this thrilling crime drama. Once free, the duo plot an audacious series of heists as their enemies close in.

programme.title: A Violent Separation
programme.desc: A young deputy in a sleepy Midwestern town faces a heart-wrenching dilemma after his troublesome brother is involved in a murder, and he is obliged to assist in the cover up. As the guilt begins to take its toll and the police investigation ensues, both men must navigate their lives wearing a mask of innocence.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: A former Green Beret wages a one-man war against police and the National Guard in the Pacific Northwest.

programme.title: The Best of Enemies
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a reluctant partnership between civil rights activist Ann Atwater and C.P. Ellis, the leader of the Ku Klux Klan, who came together to discuss the issue of racial desegregation of schools in 1971 Durham, North Carolina, which eventually lead to surprising outcomes for them and the entire community.

programme.title: A Dog's Journey
programme.desc: Bailey is a dog that has grown old through the years who makes a promise to his owner that he will find and protect his granddaughter no matter what. As Bailey's soul jumps through multiple lives, he always finds his way to her as she goes through the highs and lows of life.

programme.title: Olympic Dreams
programme.desc: It is the Winter Olympic Games and cross-country skier Penelope is a first-time Olympian. There, she meets Ezra, a volunteer dentist at the Olympic Village. After doing poorly in her competition, Penelope finds herself with plenty of time to spare until the games conclude. She begins to spend it with Ezra, and soon enough, the two become close. Slowly, they go from acquaintances, to friends, to two people who share something deeper and more intimate.

programme.title: Hollywood Shuffle
programme.desc: A young black actor dreams of landing his big break. When the opportunity comes along, he's unhappy that the part is so stereotypical.

programme.title: A Most Violent Year
programme.desc: In this gripping and stylish drama, an immigrant businessman defends his expanding NYC empire against violence and corruption during the turbulent winter of 1981.

programme.title: The Gentlemen
programme.desc: An American expat and self-made drug lord catalyzes a series of Machiavellian maneuvers by various players with a stake in London's underworld when he decides to sell his highly lucrative drug business, which involves cannabis farms hidden within the estates of aristocratic landlords.

programme.title: XXX: State of the Union
programme.desc: Thrilling shoot-'em-up sequel about a special agent who's recruited to stop a plot to kill the president.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man
programme.desc: In this quirky adventure comedy, a man stranded alone on a deserted island makes one last attempt at escape after an unusual dead body washes up on shore. The talking corpse provides the castaway with a number of unexpected tools, which he'll need if he wants to be reunited with his love.

programme.title: Zeroville
programme.desc: In 1969, an aspiring young actor makes a voyage to Los Angeles to make his break in Hollywood. However, the film industry finds itself amidst a significantly turbulent period, which may affect the futures of young actors and actresses for years afterward.

programme.title: The Jesus Rolls
programme.desc: After getting out of prison, Jesus Quintana meets up with his best friend, Petey. The two embark on a joyride in a vintage car they stole outside an upscale salon. They meet the free-spirited shampooist, Marie, whom they take with them for an adventure characterized by a string of petty crimes and a convenient three-way romance.

programme.title: The Adderall Diaries (?)
programme.desc: Writer Stephen Elliott finds success after penning a memoir about his painful adolescence and the abuse he endured at the hands of his father, but his career falls apart when his dad publicly refutes his version of events in this thrilling drama. Meanwhile, Elliott attends the trial of a seemingly perfect family man accused of killing his wife, hoping to gather material for his next book.

programme.title: Into the Forest
programme.desc: A worldwide power outage sends the globe toward the brink of the apocalypse in this riveting thriller, forcing two sisters living in an isolated house in the Canadian wilderness to adapt to their new reality and fight for survival.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man
programme.desc: In this quirky adventure comedy, a man stranded alone on a deserted island makes one last attempt at escape after an unusual dead body washes up on shore. The talking corpse provides the castaway with a number of unexpected tools, which he'll need if he wants to be reunited with his love.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: A powerful teenager and a robotic alien team up to form a superhero called Max Steel, using the guise to fight back against an extraterrestrial threat. This stunning sci-film action film is based on a line of Mattel figures.

programme.title: Sword of Trust
programme.desc: After her grandfather passed away, Cynthia inherits a sword she believed proved the South actually won the Civil War. She and her partner try to pawn the item to a local store owner, whose assistant discovers a rabid group of online conspiracy theorists eager to purchase an artifact of revisionist history. The two pairs team up and head out on a road trip to sell the sword to an eccentric collector.

programme.title: Resistance
programme.desc: Amidst the Second World War, aspiring Jewish actor Marcel Mangel recruits a group of young Jewish Boy Scouts to work on behalf of the French Resistance to protect thousands of orphaned children as the brutal Nazi regime further encroaches upon their communities.

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: George Clooney wears two hats, or in the case of this winning gridiron romp, one hat and one helmet, as both director and star. He plays Dodge Connolly, a 1920s pro-footballer who tries to save his floundering squad by signing a college star (John Krasinski) to help get the team on track and, more important, turn a profit. Renee Zellweger costars as a reporter who becomes the object of affection for both. Randy Newman, who composed the film score, has a cameo as a speakeasy piano player.

programme.title: Madeline's Madeline
programme.desc: Race, class, and artistry intersect in the world of New York experimental theatre. A gifted but troubled biracial teenager is torn between her protective mother and the theater director who pushes her to use her personal struggles in her art.

programme.title: Trespass Against Us
programme.desc: An Irish Traveller man, eager to escape the criminal lifestyle of his father and secure an education for his son, is roped into one more heist with his fellow thieves. However, their chosen victim may not be the wisest target in this gripping thriller.

programme.title: Hampstead
programme.desc: An American widow living in an expensive apartment in Hampstead Heath, London joins forces with a brusque Irish man living off the land after his cabin is threatened with demolition by real estate agents in this unconventional love story based on true events.

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: In this all-star, screwball comedy, an estranged Hollywood couple (Catherine Zeta-Jones, John Cusack) tries to create the illusion that they're happy at a press junket for their upcoming movie. Julia Roberts also stars as the actress's sister, who secretly loves brother-in-law Cusack. Billy Crystal, Christopher Walken, Hank Azaria, Stanley Tucci.

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: Two well-off single parents meet, fight, and fall in love in New York City, all while dealing with the problems of raising kids single-handedly.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: After losing his friend, an impetuous Navy pilot is accepted into Miramar's elite Fighter School. There, the pilot engages in a romance with his instructor while competing against a rival student flier for the program's coveted award.

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: George Clooney wears two hats, or in the case of this winning gridiron romp, one hat and one helmet, as both director and star. He plays Dodge Connolly, a 1920s pro-footballer who tries to save his floundering squad by signing a college star (John Krasinski) to help get the team on track and, more important, turn a profit. Renee Zellweger costars as a reporter who becomes the object of affection for both. Randy Newman, who composed the film score, has a cameo as a speakeasy piano player.

programme.title: Semper Fi
programme.desc: A police officer serves double time with the Marine Corps Reserves. However, his loyalty to his country, his uniform, and his own ethical code is called into question when his incarcerated brother asks for help from behind bars. He must then make a choice between duty to one's service and duty to one's family.

programme.title: Never Goin' Back
programme.desc: Delinquent Texas teens Jessie and Angela are working as diner waitresses to fund their dream beach vacation to Galveston. However, the immature, party-loving pair put their plans in jeopardy with a series of drug-fueled hijinks and small-town escapades.

programme.title: Sword of Trust
programme.desc: After her grandfather passed away, Cynthia inherits a sword she believed proved the South actually won the Civil War. She and her partner try to pawn the item to a local store owner, whose assistant discovers a rabid group of online conspiracy theorists eager to purchase an artifact of revisionist history. The two pairs team up and head out on a road trip to sell the sword to an eccentric collector.

programme.title: Leadbelly
programme.desc: About the life and career of legendary guitarist-folk singer Huddie Ledbetter (1888-1949).

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: In this heartwrenching drama, a woman and her young son are held captive for years in a tiny shed. They finally manage to escape from their abductor, but the pair struggle to adjust to the outside world after their traumatic confinement.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: While in jail, an extreme-sports enthusiast is blackmailed by a government agency to attempt to infiltrate a Russian crime ring that has access to biochemical weapons. An action-packed adrenaline rush.

programme.title: Mother of George
programme.desc: In this intimate, poignant drama, a Nigerian couple living in Brooklyn deal with severe relationship turmoil when they have trouble getting pregnant.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
programme.desc: The sweeping conclusion to the \"Twilight\" series follows Bella, Edward and Jacob as they band together to fight a group of ancient vampires who are threatening to destroy Bella and Edward's family.

programme.title: Ambition
programme.desc: A young, aspiring musician is confident she can win it all in an upcoming competition, but during the preparation period, she winds up in a dangerous trap from which there may be no way out.

programme.title: Volition
programme.desc: James has lived his entire life with an unusual ability of foresight and, as he ages, he struggles to cope with his powers of clairvoyance. Yet when he experiences an unsettling insight into his own murder, he strives to change the future in his present.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: Strong performances and a taut script drive this pulse-pounding thriller about a forensic psychologist (Morgan Freeman) tracking an elusive serial killer. Helping him is a medical intern (Ashley Judd)---the only abductee to escape the killer's dungeon. Cary Elwes, Tony Goldwyn, Jay O. Sanders, Bill Nunn.

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: In this taut thriller, forensics expert Alex Cross investigates the disappearance of a senator's daughter, a student at a prestigious private academy.
